name: B A T T L E - B U R S T
name_original: B A T T L E - B U R S T
description:
I originally made this for BeerSK game jam. But I honestly had a lot of fun and decided to add a vapor wave aesthetic over the top.  The issue is I goofed by not making it about beer, all in all it was still fun anyway.

Download the "ultimate aesthetic build" for the best experience (Y).

The music is by the FreeMusicArchive user "Anonymous420" and you can find it here:
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Anonymous420/

The ship Model is by Joshua Hoare

I used the standard Unity Post Processing stack and a Pixelation shader by
http://dtimofeev.blogspot.ru/

and also some sweet Aesthetic images by "Summer to the spring"
https://summer-to-the-spring.deviantart.com/art/Vaporwave-Png-s-Gifs-Stock-Pack-...

Shader thanks to Kalvin Pierce.

I haven't  tested the Mac build
